General.Name: Atmofizer Technologies Inc
General.Description: Atmofizer Technologies Inc. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells air purification devices in Canada and the United States. The company offers Atmofizer One that reduces airborne viruses and bacteria in treated air, as well as neutralize ultra-fine particulates. The company provides air purification devices for smaller commercial rooms, larger commercial spaces, and consumer use. Atmofizer Technologies Inc. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 550 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2B5
